Package de.oth.blocklib.threading

Class RenderThread

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.threading.RenderThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
DoubleBuffer
public class RenderThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements DoubleBuffer
The class containing the main tasks of the thread that is used to communicate with OpenGL. It does NOT use threads internally. Should this become a requirement another class should handle concurrency and then call the functions of this class.
Author:
Loher Florian

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    java.lang.String RENDER_THREAD_NAME  
    private Renderer renderer  
    private java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger swapInterval

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    RenderThread​(long windowId, Renderer renderer)  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void decreaseSwap()
    Decrease the swap interval which increases the frame rate (at most to the possible maximum performance) because OpenGL will wait for number of swapInterval refreshes of the monitor.
    void increaseSwap()
    Increase the swap interval which reduces the frame rate because OpenGL will wait for number of swapInterval refreshes of the monitor.
    void init()
    Rename the current thread to RENDER_THREAD_NAME and set the swap interval to the current value of swapInterval.
    void loadGraphics()
    Run all scheduled tasks of the loader.
    private void setRenderThreadName()  
    void submitRender()
    Submit render to OpenGL and subsequently initiate a buffer swap so the new frame is shown.
    void swapBuffer()
    Swaps the buffers of Loader and Renderer

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • init

      public void init()
      Rename the current thread to RENDER_THREAD_NAME and set the swap interval to the current value of swapInterval.

    • setRenderThreadName

      private void setRenderThreadName()

    • increaseSwap

      public void increaseSwap()
      Increase the swap interval which reduces the frame rate because OpenGL will wait for number of swapInterval refreshes of the monitor.

    • decreaseSwap

      public void decreaseSwap()
      Decrease the swap interval which increases the frame rate (at most to the possible maximum performance) because OpenGL will wait for number of swapInterval refreshes of the monitor.

    • loadGraphics

      public void loadGraphics()
      Run all scheduled tasks of the loader. This will load and delete data on the GPU.

    • submitRender

      public void submitRender()
      Submit render to OpenGL and subsequently initiate a buffer swap so the new frame is shown.

    • swapBuffer

      public void swapBuffer()
      Swaps the buffers of Loader and Renderer
      Specified by:
      swapBuffer in interface DoubleBuffer
